amendment.description: Amendment adds the head of Atomic Energy Organization of Iran to the list of Iranian leaders.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lance amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Lance.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lance amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
